channel.title: Small P.I Bug
channel.description:
Hey.
This is the bug:
Someone makes a new account(Just joins) I cannot see there text there typing,But if they make another level 3 I'll be able to see there text that they're writing.
Any ideas how to fix?
Regards,Matt
